item.title: AI Search Algorithms
item.description: Search algorithms help find the correct sequence of actions in a search space, to reach a goal state. The sequence of actions might be: Sequence in which citis are to be visited to travel from a source to a detination under a given cost function (shortest path, cheapest fare etc.) Sequence in which an agent should play moves in a game (chess, tic tac toe, pacman etc.) to win a board game Sequence in which a robot arm should solder components on a PCB under a given cost function (e.
